item.title: Former UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak returns to Goldman Sachs
item.description: Former U.K. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak is set to rejoin Goldman Sachs as a senior adviser, the bank said Tuesday.

item.title: IRS says churches can endorse political candidates without losing tax-exempt status
item.description: Two churches and a religious group sued the IRS in 2024, saying their First Amendment rights were violated by the ban on endorsing candidates in elect...

item.title: Trump announces steep tariffs on 14 countries starting Aug. 1
item.description: President Donald Trump, in social media posts, shared screenshots of signed form letters dictating new tariff rates to the leaders of 14 countries.

item.title: Trump's tariffs overshadow the pomp and pageantry as Macron meets King Charles
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron and his wife will be treated to the best of British pomp and pageantry during their three-day state visit to the U.K.

item.title: Trump says Musk has gone 'off the rails' after Tesla CEO announces new political party
item.description: Elon Musk said in a post Saturday on X that he had set up the "American Party" to compete against the Republican and Democratic parties.
